trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There was one other sighting in Portland on or around July 24th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailswas in the back yard with my dog siting in a chair in the shade i pick up my juice bottle to drink and looked up in the sky i could it as plain as day...i thought it was a balloon then a plane the lights were big and it was a triangle shape slowlying spining then i heard a plane in the distance then it became silent...then it started it manuver strangely slowly spinning i could see the 2 lights 1 red 1 green like orbs and behind it a triangle dark thing the more i looked at it the more and more i did not reconize the shape(plane, weather, balloon.or other wise it seem to move up towards the sky slowly spining i think clock wise i could not move i wanted to get my cell phone to take a pic but i just didnt want to leave..i watched 12min till it faded still frist red the green then at the very end before it faded into the sky it winked out and could see a black orb in the sky and that was it 30 minutes later i could see and hear planes again my dog got sick and threw up a few times he doesnt feel well..nor do i....like i said my brain couldnt come up with or reconize what it was.but i know it wasnt balloons or a plane ect..the color was beyond bright like stars.remembering more...as it started to climb it kinda looked like planets in the eveing sky.it didnt manuver like anything i ever saw...i stood there paralized i felt helpless no was around. for me to say i have neighbors on all sides.i was just staring in amazment i'm still shaking its 6:10pm my dog is really quite layin next to me..when i saw it fade and wink out i felt as i was pulled away..like a��� magnet.
Summary: triangle shape with 1red and 1 green light taking turns winking as it spun slowly as it hoverd across the sky
